title: How Many Calories in a Quesadilla?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a quesadilla, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Quesadilla?
assumptions: Standard 8-inch flour tortilla with 1 oz cheddar cheese, folded and pan-fried lightly in minimal oil; no fillings like meat or veggies.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by tortilla size, cheese type/amount, added fillings, cooking method, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A basic cheese quesadilla has about 410 kcal, with 15 g protein and 25 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use corn tortilla instead of flour

faqs.q: How many calories in a basic cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: Approximately 410 kcal for an 8-inch flour tortilla with 1 oz cheese.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 15 g protein, 25 g fat, 25 g carbs, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does adding meat increase calories in a quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, like 2 oz chicken adds ~100 kcal and boosts protein.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect quesadilla calories?
faqs.a: Pan-frying adds minimal oil; baking reduces fat compared to deep-frying.
